productSchema.description: Usage message for a Next Generation (Nova) server.
productSchema.attribute: The flavor id of the server.
The flavor name of the server.

attribute.name: status
attribute.allowedValues: ACTIVE BUILD DELETED ERROR HARD_REBOOT MIGRATING PASSWORD REBOOT REBUILD RESCUE RESIZE REVERT_RESIZE SUSPENDED UNKNOWN VERIFY_RESIZE SHELVED

productSchema.attribute: The OS license type for this server.
An application license on this server.
The amount of bandwidth in, in kilobytes.
The amount of bandwidth out, in kilobytes.

xpathAssertion.test: if ( @applicationLicense = 'MSSQL_WEB' or @applicationLicense = 'MSSQL' ) then not( @osLicenseType = 'RHEL' or @osLicenseType = 'LINUX' ) else true()

productSchema.xpathAssertion: If applicationLicense is MSSQL_WEB or MSSQL, then osLicenseType can not be RHEL or LINUX.
